description: Properties of an operations event definition shall be defined as operations event definition properties. An operations event definition shall be further characterized through zero or more operations event definition properties. Operations event definition properties may contain nested operations event definition properties
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: mapsTo
contents.description: If the operations event definition supports an operations event class, the operations event class property(s) are applied in the operations event definition property(s). This operations event definition property maps to the corresponding operations event class property

contents.name: contains
contents.description: The nested operations event definition property(s) makes up part of this operations event definition property as the whole

contents.name: description
contents.description: Additional information and description about the operations event definition property

contents.name: propertyType
contents.description: Defines the type of the property.

enumValues.name: classType
enumValues.description: The property value is defined for the class and there is no value associated with an instance

enumValues.name: instanceType
enumValues.description: the property value of the class is undefined

enumValues.name: defaultType
enumValues.description: The property value is defined for the class as the default instance value, but individual instances of the class may redefine specific values.

contents.name: value
contents.description: The value, set of values, or range of the property.

contents.name: valueUnitOfMeasure
contents.description: The unit of measure of the associated property value
